author: pulp1559
content: hello, could anyone point me where to find the addresses in hoodi for partial withdrawals, consolidations and deposit requests contract? thanks üôè

author: parithosh
content: its the same as mainnet, so they are present in each EIP defining the feature

author: pulp1559
content: apologies, couldn't find deposit requests address, tests or some solidity code sample like 7002 or 7251. I checked here: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6110, https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7685 and https://github.com/lightclient/sys-asm but maybe I'm in the wrong place? author: jgm
content: Take a look at https://github.com/wealdtech/ethereal which is a CLI that allows you to do these things.  You can also look at the underlying transactions that are sent, if you want to replicate the functionality elsewhere.
